data.name: ImmaterialAI Plus lite
data.detailed_description:
Get the essential features of the premium upgrade to the praised ImmaterialAI platform at a fraction of the price!

If you get ImmaterialAI Plus lite you will get access to a discounted upgrade to Plus, available after purchase here: https://store.steampowered.com/bundle/27584/.

Meta models

  • create new dimensions of data
    • node types e.g. Person, Entity, Event, Feeling, Worldview, Belief
    • link types e.g. Parallels, Depends on, Related to
  • update default node and link types
  • ability to constrain link types to specific node types
  • hotwords to query through meta data from the search bar, use "meta" to show all node and link types
  • set custom colors and icons to your meta data, visible all throughout the app (in graphs too!)
  • Tapping on the category of a node/link type will filter your home page to show only node/link types
  • Tapping on the category of a node (e.g. feeling 'happy') to filter only feelings will now also show up the node type itself

To-do system

  • Assign to-do status to any node
  • Standalone auto-generated task board,
  • (NEW) create tasks and nodes on the fly inside the task board
  • Task filter added to the home page
  • hotwords to query through all tasks from the search bar, type "todo", "inprogress", "done","tasks" and variations to show tasks of different states

More in ImmaterialAI Plus (https://store.steampowered.com/app/1870060/ImmaterialAI_Plus/)

data.short_description: The essentials of ImmaterialAI Plus at a fraction of the price, meta models and task management semantics are here in a standalone DLC for all free users!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/ 8/ 10/ 11
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1+ Support, and recommended dedicated graphics card with 128 MB of RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
